summary: Liquid was instructed to pause trading by the legal team acting for FTX.
title: FTX-acquired Liquid pauses trading five days after suspending withdrawals
content: Crypto exchange Liquid stopped trading on its platform only five days after suspending fiat and crypto withdrawals on the platform.

Japan's Financial Services Agency ordered FTX Japan on Nov. 10 to cease business operations and hold assets in the country equivalent to its balance-sheet liabilities until Dec. 9. FTX Japan was a result of FTX’s acquisition of the Liquid Group.
